name: iatrogenic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a disease or problem) caused by medical treatment or by a doctor: Iatrogenic infections are responsible for thousands of deaths among hospital patients each year. Minimally invasive spinal surgery reduces the risk of iatrogenic injury. If a complication such as excessive bleeding arises during a biopsy procedure, the complication is iatrogenic.
